subtitle: Hello everyone, Gene here with another episode, and i just want to address a couple of very common
issues that people run into while having astral projection experiences as well as some effective
tips for chanting mantras that i haven't covered yet all of the advice in this video should be
very unique to most of you i don't really see this information being shared round the first
tip is about not being able to see in the astral this is very common and it's where someone is
in the astral and everything is dark you know they are in their astral body moving around
in another dimension but they cannot see and the second tip is about not being able to go through
walls more commonly the person cannot leave their room and if they try to go through a
wall they either get stuck or wake up these two problems that people run into are very
predominant indicators that you are in a typical astral environment as opposed to a dream because
unlike a dream you are experiencing what absolutely feels like physical
limitation and in many ways in those moments you are experiencing physical limitation in the
astral, so the astral is not 100% non-physical, it does have some physical-like quality to it, some
physicality, not in the normal way we understand it but in a more malleable and energetic way because
remember the astral is intimately connected to the physical it is not something separate whereas in
dreams anything is possible and it is separate and it is completely non-physical if you want to
see something in a dream you can see it if you want to go through walls or objects and dreams
it's usually very easy but it's not the case for the astral plane and the astral body because
these environments have a substance and objective quality of its own not powered from the measly
fantasies of the egoic illusory mind or dreams so three tips in this episode and there are time
stamps in the description for each section if you aren't interested in all of them and just before i
get into them a reminder that if you want to join a like-minded group of people we have a private
astral doorway discord group which has a lot of wise supportive and experienced members both in
general spirituality and astral travel and of course i am very active there helping people too
the patreon link is in the description below if you're interested in joining a shout out to jaz
chris ben jorg lucifer and hunter who all joined this week so let's begin with not being able to
see in the astral or astral blindness as it's sometimes referred to if you've experienced
it before then you'll absolutely know what i'm talking about and if you haven't well it's where
you are out of body but you simply cannot see the solution i'm giving is extremely simple and it has
always worked for me in my personal experience and it's a little trick that you may have not
heard of before so if you ever cannot see while in the astral simply use your fingers to pry open
your eyelids so again to be very clear you are in a situation where you are in your astral body and
you move your astral hands to your astral eyes and you use your astral fingertips to
force open your eyelids when you do this you will begin to see where you are and what is in front of
you and around you i am stressing the word astral body parts because people always ask if you have
to use your physical body at all and of course not clearly if you opened your physical body's eyes
then you will wake up so to be even more specific i personally you don't have to but it makes the
most sense i personally use my index fingers and thumbs to open my eyes in the astral it's like
pinching your eyes but you're opening them once your astral eyes are open start analyzing any
visual details that you spot and your vision will slowly ground itself in the environment and become
stronger now don't worry about if your physical eyes will open or something just focus on seeing
in the experience that you are you should not even be thinking about your physical body just
enjoy and be immersed in wherever you are out of body now some people will advise to
move away from your body some people seem to experience this astral blindness if they're
near their physical body and they can't open their eyes it sounds like it works for a lot of people
that if they can't see they just travel away from their physical body and then they can see
personally i've never experienced anything like that uh regardless of where i am even if i'm next
to my physical body i'm still able to open my eyes with the technique that i just explained another
common piece of advice is saying an affirmation such as clarity now i think that should work too
but again i've never had to attempt to use anything like that simply using my fingers has
always worked for me personally so if you're stuck having these experiences where you can't see and
you've tried different things then definitely give this a go where you use your fingertips to simply
open your eyes now the next tip is about not being able to travel through walls or fly through walls
it's very common especially for those who are relatively new to astral projection
they usually find themselves in a situation where they come out of their body successfully in their
room but they can't leave their room or house because they can't go through walls or better said
they don't know how to and it's mostly because they probably are overthinking the process when
they are going through a wall that's what it seems like when people ask me this question they have a
lot of apprehension and anxiety towards it so of course when it happens in their experience then
it may not go the way that they want some people even begin to believe it's not possible because
unlike dreams the physicality of the astral has become very apparent to them they go around with
a core belief that the astral dimension is a place where it isn't possible to go through walls but
it is possible and the solution is also quite simple but requires a little more practice and
willpower so when you're in the astral no matter where you are if you want to go through a wall
you usually can't go through it with a bit of weak little effort you must first brace yourself
and get ready to go through the wall become like a bull who's ready to bulldoze have feel strength
and absolute conviction that you will go through the wall successfully i never usually had issues
with going through walls but sometime earlier this year i was in the astral exploring a church
which was closed and so i went into it by going through a wall the first time was fine i went
through it as i usually do and i found myself in a room with the doors locked and so i tried
to go through a wall again but to my surprise i ended up about halfway through the wall and
bounced back into the same room i did it again and the same thing happened and so with determination
i braced myself and strengthened myself and ran into the wall with force and i successfully went
through to the other side into another room and i kept doing this throughout the church until i
decided to leave again i kept going through the walls because you know i wanted to practice and
master going through walls and so really it's quite simple you just need some determination
and willpower as i said earlier so ever since this experience i have always gone through walls
in this same spirit uh just simply get ready to go through it like when runners in a marathon
get ready to race they take a stance where they're ready to zoom forward in an instant
it's that simple be strong and vigorously push yourself through the other side quickly with a
warrior-like mindset or attitude okay so definitely give this a try
if you've been having problems not being able to go through walls don't let it demotivate you
if you failed in the past it is possible the last tip i want to talk about is a very effective
way to chance almost any mantra and it's a combination of saying them out loud and also
mentally i've given a few mantras now and i'll be discussing even more in the future
and you know just before i do start talking about even more mantras uh i want to first stress that
by no means is this tip mandatory nor is there any usually any kind of strict way you should
chant mantras since i've released videos about mantras which a lot of you have been enjoying and
having success with which is really great to hear there have also been a lot of questions related to
how they should be recited and there's quite a few people who are almost overthinking the
process and sort of missing the point of the mantras with mantras you can simply experiment
like a scientist in terms of how you want to chant them you can combine ways to do it at different
times of the day or do them for different lengths of time follow your gut follow your instincts
follow what you enjoy after a certain amount of practice you'll develop a sense of what you need
during certain times in your life a lot of people are always asking what's the best way
just give me you know a black and white answer but everyone is different and every day brings
new energies life comes in seasons so for those of you asking me what are the best ways this is
simply why it's impossible for someone else to judge what's best for someone in reality
there is no best way or worst way to chance mantras find your way and what works for you
remember that what is primary is the practice of delving into deeper states of consciousness while
in meditation and what is secondary is how we are chanting any given mantra so with all that said
this is a method for chanting mantras and can be applied to any of the mantras i've taught on this
channel and for future ones even the egypto mantra can be applied in this way so again this is quite
a simple technique all you do is begin by chanting the mantra out loud for a certain length of time
during your meditation and then slowly as you begin to get into a calmer and deeper state
and perhaps a little lethargic state right you might even feel you are in some kind of
trance you're going very deep you begin to quieten and slow down the mantra until you eventually
begin chanting the mantra mentally okay so this tip is about reciting mantras out loud
and then going deeper and deeper and into yourself until you eventually start mantralizing mentally
which means you are not using your physical voice so as you begin to only do it mentally you
keep a sense of still allowing the mantra to be chanted deeper and deeper inside within yourself
so the longer you chant the mantra and stay in meditation the deeper you go and the deeper you
let the mantra penetrate within deeper and more profound levels of your being deeper neural
pathways of the mind and this can be reflected in the way you chant the mantra which starts off
being in the physical and slowly transitions to being chanted in the non-physical in your mind
so for example the pharah own mantra you can simply chant it out loud
and then as you go deeper and say it more quietly and profoundly
as if you're falling to sleep and then eventually there is absolute silence in the physical and
your mind continues to chant the mantra internally mentally and of course with the far own mantra you
eventually fall asleep with it or if it's other types of mantras especially ones i'll be teaching
in the future you eventually just stop doing it mentally enjoy some inner peace and silence for
some time until you decide to bring back your awareness back to the physical when you decide to
stop your practice okay so this technique to chance mantras is kind of like uh catapults
except the catapult is not going outwardly it is going inwardly we start off loud and
external and it moves inwards deeper and deeper into more profound states of being
you could call it the backwards catapult mantra technique okay so i'm sure these few tips will
help a lot of you i hope and these are related to a lot of common questions i get so if you have
any questions you're always free to ask below as you've probably noticed i get back to almost all
the questions that i can sometimes i may not be able to see your question i may have missed it
because youtube doesn't make it clear sometimes to see all of the comments so if you want
more one-on-one opportunities to get help from me or others uh consider joining the patreon where i
will definitely see your messages this is Astral Doorway and i'll see you on the next episode.
